attributes.additional_details:
Plans are being drawn up for Brandon in Suffolk which include proposals for up to 2000 new homes.

Having this many new homes would almost double the town's population and also destroy many of the picturesque areas we currently have.

Brandon is a small town and we, the residents, would like to keep it that way.

We would like the government to listen to us and not allow thousands of houses to be built in Brandon.
